title: VW Taigun, Virtus get discounts worth more than Rs 2 lakh in May
description: Volkswagen is offering attractive discounts and offers on both the Virtus sedan and the Taigun SUV this month, especially on their automatic variants. Depending on the variant, customers can avail of a flat cash discount, an exchange or scrappage bonus, and a loyalty bonus.  Virtus prices currently range between Rs 11.56 lakh and Rs 19.40 lakh Taigun is priced between Rs 11.80 lakh and Rs 19.83 lakh Benefits include cash offers, exchange/scrappage bonus and loyalty bonus Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to the availability of stock. Check with your local dealer for exact figures. Volkswagen Virtus discounts May 2025 Save up to Rs 2.10 lakh Volkswagen is offering benefits of up to Rs 1.90 lakh on the 1.0-litre TSI AT variants of the Virtus in the Highline and Topline trims, while the GT line trim gets up to Rs 80,000 off. The higher-spec 1.5-litre TSI DSG variants (GT Plus Sport and Chrome) have up to Rs 1.35 lakh off. Additionally, a scrappage benefit of up to Rs 20,000 is applicable on all variants. Volkswagen is also offering the base Comfortline trim with the 1.0 TSI MT, which costs Rs 11.56 lakh, at a special offer price of Rs 10.44 lakh. Volkswagen Taigun discounts May 2025 Save up to Rs 2.70 lakh The Taigun is available with benefits of up to Rs 2.35 lakh on the Topline 1.0-litre TSI AT variant. Meanwhile, the Highline and the GT Line trims with the same powertrain get benefits of up to Rs 1.40 lakh and Rs 1.45 lakh, respectively. Even more attractive are benefits on the 1.5-litre TSI DSG variants – up to Rs 2 lakh off on the GT Plus Sport trim and up to Rs 2.50 lakh off on the GT Plus Chrome. Like with the Virtus, all variants of the Taigun also get scrappage benefit of up to Rs 20,000. The Taigun’s base variant, Comfortline 1.0 TSI MT, is also available at a special offer price of Rs 10.99 lakh, which is otherwise listed at Rs 11.80 lakh. ALL PRICES ARE EX-SHOWROOM, DELHI Also, see: Maruti Wagon R, Swift and Celerio get up to Rs 65,000 off this month Hyundai Ioniq 5 gets Rs 4 lakh off this month

Both Virtus and Taigun also get a scrappage benefit of Rs 20,000 on all variants.

Volkswagen is offering attractive discounts and offers on both the Virtus sedan and the Taigun SUV this month, especially on their automatic variants. Depending on the variant, customers can avail of a flat cash discount, an exchange or scrappage bonus, and a loyalty bonus. 

  1. Virtus prices currently range between Rs 11.56 lakh and Rs 19.40 lakh
  2. Taigun is priced between Rs 11.80 lakh and Rs 19.83 lakh
  3. Benefits include cash offers, exchange/scrappage bonus and loyalty bonus

Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to the availability of stock. Check with your local dealer for exact figures.

Volkswagen Virtus discounts May 2025

Save up to Rs 2.10 lakh

Volkswagen is offering benefits of up to Rs 1.90 lakh on the 1.0-litre TSI AT variants of the Virtus in the Highline and Topline trims, while the GT line trim gets up to Rs 80,000 off. The higher-spec 1.5-litre TSI DSG variants (GT Plus Sport and Chrome) have up to Rs 1.35 lakh off. Additionally, a scrappage benefit of up to Rs 20,000 is applicable on all variants. Volkswagen is also offering the base Comfortline trim with the 1.0 TSI MT, which costs Rs 11.56 lakh, at a special offer price of Rs 10.44 lakh.

Volkswagen Taigun discounts May 2025

Save up to Rs 2.70 lakh

The Taigun is available with benefits of up to Rs 2.35 lakh on the Topline 1.0-litre TSI AT variant. Meanwhile, the Highline and the GT Line trims with the same powertrain get benefits of up to Rs 1.40 lakh and Rs 1.45 lakh, respectively. Even more attractive are benefits on the 1.5-litre TSI DSG variants – up to Rs 2 lakh off on the GT Plus Sport trim and up to Rs 2.50 lakh off on the GT Plus Chrome. Like with the Virtus, all variants of the Taigun also get scrappage benefit of up to Rs 20,000. The Taigun’s base variant, Comfortline 1.0 TSI MT, is also available at a special offer price of Rs 10.99 lakh, which is otherwise listed at Rs 11.80 lakh.
